description.value:
Trigger A creature takes a hostile action against Mogaru, produces a visible area effect, or flies within 120 feet of Mogaru

Effect Creatures in the area must succeed at a @Check[type:reflex|dc:40] save or take @Damage[(6d10+28)[bludgeoning]] damage.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half damage and is pushed 20 feet away. If flying, it descends 20 feet.

Failure The creature takes full damage, is pushed 40 feet, and descends 60 feet (if flying) or is knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Prone].

Critical Failure The creature takes double damage, is pushed 60 feet away, descends 120 feet (if flying) or is knocked prone, and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stunned]{Stunned 2}.

details.description: Mogaru's tail sweeps forth, causing an arc of devastation in a @Template[type:cone|distance:60].
details.disable: @Check[type:performance|dc:45|name:Divert Mogaru's Attention] (legendary) or @Check[type:deception|dc:48|name:Divert Mogaru's Attention] (legendary) to momentarily divert Mogaru's attention
details.reset: Mogaru doesn't swat his tail again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.
